text:
<!everyone> hey folks!
we have two cool things happening next week:
1. on wednesday at 1pm ET / 10am PT, <@U019F15SA7Q> is hosting a free content refresh workshop. this isn't a webinar—she'll be explaining exactly how to choose which posts to refresh and you'll have your own list be the end of this session. *<https://superpath.co/content-refreshing-workshop|you can see the schedule, learn more and signup here>*
2. on thursday at 1pm ET / 10am PT, we're doing a web3 AMA with <@U01AHL8AGBB>. this is happening in the <#C014P2BJLER|general> channel and we'll be talking all about web3. what the heck is it? what do you say when your boss asks you about it? what are the downsides? *<https://calndr.link/event/ZApCzctzh1|you can add this event to your calendar here>.*
okay, onto jobs!
---
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Paystone is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266652-inbound-marketing-manager-remote-canada-paystone|Inbound Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Close is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/255485-head-of-content-100-remote-close|Head of Content> :zap:

• WEBRIS is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/244071-content-strategist-global-remote-webris|Content Strategist> ️:tv:

• Siege Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/241976-content-marketing-manager-remote-siege-media|Content Marketing Manager> ($73-83k)

• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-senior-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Director of Content Marketing> :tv: (:wave: <@UJ7RT1J1X>)
• Invicti Security is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/236857-director-of-content-invicti-security|Director of Content>
• Mosaic is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235606-content-marketing-manager-mosaic|Content Marketing Manager> ($90-$120K)
• mParticle is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235092-content-marketing-manager-mparticle|Content Marketing Manager>
• Crelate️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232859-senior-content-marketing-manager-crelate|Senior Content Marketing Manager>
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
• Avive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222645-content-and-communications-marketing-manager-avive|Content & Communications Marketing Manager> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U013BG9P1UN>)

:v: jimmy
